Plot: 15 years after his girlfriend was murdered by a KGB agent in Prague, ex-CIA agent Daniel Smith walks into a barber shop in Los Angeles. With the razor blade pressing against his throat, ...
Title: Reckoning
Writer: Matthew Marder, Anders Helde, Matthew Marder (original story), Matthew Marder (original scenario)
Actors: Ric Maddox, Matt Lasky, Bonnie Kathleen Ryan
